comment: At bottling, beer smelled fantastic in the bucket -notes of tropical fruit with some pine and citrus. Beer tasted a bit 'green', possibly due to higher fermentation temp and poor temp management (brewed in August and fermented in the 75-77 range. Will test a 12 oz bottle in 2 weeks and post comments on taste after a few weeks of bottle conditioning/carbing  in the low 70s.
Define "green" and how did it turn out?
